Package org.janusproject.acl.encoding

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACLEncodingService
    This class manages all the encoding/decoding repartition tasks.
    BitEfficientACLCodec
    TODO : class supposed to permit to encode/decode the content of an ACL Message in Bit Efficient.
    BitEfficientEnvelopeCodec
    This class encodes an ACLMessageEnvelope in bytes or decodes an ACLMessageEnvelope encoded in bytes
    BSONACLCodec
    This class encodes an ACLMessageContent in BSON or decodes an ACLMessageContent encoded in bytes to BSON
    JSONACLCodec
    This class encodes an ACLMessageContent in JSON or decodes an ACLMessageContent encoded in bytes to JSON
    StringACLCodec
    This class encodes an ACLMessageContent in String or decodes an ACLMessageContent encoded in bytes to String
    StringACLCodecHelper
    Helper used to parse and rebuild the decoded ACLMessageContent.
    XMLACLCodec
    TODO : class supposed to permit to encode/decode the content of an ACL Message in XML.
    XMLEnvelopeCodec
    TODO : class supposed to permit to encode/decode the envelope of an ACL Message in XML.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PayloadEncoding
    This enumeration corresponds to the different type of encoding (UTF-8, ISO, ASCII...)
